title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - Avenida Alfonso VIII
description: We spent here one night because the car park next door was full, we saw this esplanade and there were only 3 cars; when we got up around 10 o'clock, there were more cars because the entire city is a blue zone, and we can park in this area because it is already a little on the outskirts of buildings and streets without issues.

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 24 Paseo Ocharan Mazas
description: It is a azol area, with parking meters, on the promenade, 5 minutes walk to the town hall. Worth to spend the day

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 1 Avenida la Playa
description: Wide blue zone, the AC of 5-7 meters enter, we have also found sites in the surrounding streets (low season, that's why we have been lucky anyway) We have not found official areas for emptying in the whole town, only sewers in secondary streets ...

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 12 Avenida la Playa
description: It is not a specific car park for AC and it is a blue zone, but the police told us that we could park here without problem and spend the night, as long as we did not camp. In the evening it is easy to find a place along the promenade. Very quiet night, no commotion of people. I recommend it. Beautiful views.

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 4 Barrio Brazomar
description: Unlimited paying parking in a quiet street 50 m from the seafront promenade. Shops nearby and town center and castle 1 km away. accessible on foot.

title: (39700) Castro-Urdiales - 14 Avenida la Playa
description:
It's a blue zone, but chargeable, we spent a whole day including the night.
we were an AC and no problem.
Very close to the pso marítimo and a pleasant walk to the town.
There is traffic of cars.

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales -
description: Great spot on the waterfront with 20 spaces up the dead end street. Toilets, showers etc 2min walk away at the beach. Beautiful views of the church. You’d be silly to miss this.

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 31 Calle de Silvestre Ochoa
title_short: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 31 Calle de Silvestre Ochoa
description: Be careful not to occupy the bus seats, if they call the police they fine you, use the other parking spaces. In Castro you can park and sleep anywhere, as long as you pay for the blue or red zone, I recommend going to the seafront, you park on the right, one-way street, quiet area, and two minutes from downtown, but remember to pay for parking, if there are machines you pay

title: (39700) Castro-Urdiales - 45 Calle Carretera Irún
description: Laundromat accessible at the service station

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 24A Calle Leonardo Rucabado
description: Parking of the Eroski shopping center and gas station. We only slept a few hours to continue the route. Quiet place and near the exit of the highway. No special charm.

title: (39700) Castro-Urdiales - 63 Barrio Allendelagua
description: Parking in adventure park. Ideal area to spend the day and visit Castro Urdiales and surroundings. Go to the beach, mountains...etc. Adventure activities.

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 16D Barrio Urdiales
description: Parking in front of the cemetery and the green cliff area where you can walk. Toilets inside and a tap of water. A very quiet place. You can walk along the ocean with great views till the town.

title: (39709) Castro-Urdiales - 5 Calle del Ocho de Marzo
title_short: (39709) Castro-Urdiales - 5 Calle del Ocho de Marzo
description: Unlimited parking area.

name: Camping de Castro
title: (39700) Camping de Castro
description:
Castro Urdiales, 66 Barrio Allendelagua.
Camping de Castro, above the bullring of Castro Urdiales well indicated from the bullring, small path to get there, good reception, you have to hold steep terrain.

title: (39706) Castro-Urdiales - 1001A Lugar Barrio Mioño
description: Quiet street at the end of a small settlement. You can always find a place. You can walk the dog along a dirt road.

title: (39709) Castro Urdiales - 100 Barrio Mioño
description: Car parks under trees next to a river and park. Cool with good shade. Only for campers due to the height of the trees.

title: (39709) Castro Urdiales - 111 Barrio Mioño
description: Quiet area to sleep with the motorhome, you sleep with the sound of the waves of the sea. Horses and dogs from the area are occasionally heard. The views are incredible, green landscape and the beach of Dicido. In this area there is another parking lot across the bridge. Beach showers. At the end of the beach there is a waterfall and rocks with spectacular green moss for photos. Recommendable.

title: (39709) Castro Urdiales - 100 Barrio Mioño
description: We spent a quiet night listening to the sea. We slept 2 motorhomes of about 6.5 meters. In the day there is a lot of traffic but it is perfect to spend the night. We moved from the parking lot on the beach because there was a lot of noise to sleep.

title: (39709) Castro-Urdiales - 82D Barrio Mioño
description: Parking of the municipal field. Very quiet area without services.

title: (39709) Castro Urdiales - 100-102 Barrio Mioño
description: Large parking lot with the beach in front. It is a good place to surf (the best session is at low tide). Access to the car park is not possible for vehicles over 2m high as there is a barrier on the outside of it, but on the other side of the beach, it is possible to arrive and park for any type of vehicle. At the entrance of the beach there are showers available all year round and also a drinking water fountain to fill bottles / jugs of water. Tables and chairs can be removed without problem. In summer it is too crowded and it is practically impossible to find a place but in low season it is very calm and it is even possible to put up the awning. I live a few minutes from this spot and I usually spend many nights here. No trouble sleeping. The police stop by to check that everything is correct but nothing more. Little coverage. Take care of the environment!!

title: (39706) Castro Urdiales - 76D Barrio Mioño
description: Parking day and night, no service, very quiet close to shops

title: (39709) Castro-Urdiales - 1001 Barrio Mioño
description: On the same N-634, right next to the Saltacaballo Restaurant. Esplanade of land to park, quite level. Enough to spend a quiet night. The terrace of the Saltacaballo Restaurant has beautiful views.

title: (39709) Castro Urdiales - 211 Barrio Mioño
description: Gravel parking with great views and close to a restaurant. quiet zone.

title: (39706) Castro Urdiales - 8a Barrio Lusa
description: Next to an old disused manual laundry, next to a small river and a playground. Trees that offer plenty of shade (space for 1-3 vans). The ACs (space for many) can spend the night on the abandoned soccer field right next door, paved and totally flat. Almost no one passes by, just a few dog walkers from the urbanization. It is relatively close to a main road although without direct access to it, you are not seen from it either. It worked out for us one night on the way to Euskal Herria.

title: (39798) Islares - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful grassy spot with views. Road is a bit rough. Can be done in 2 wheel drive van. Has some picnic benches too. Plenty of shade. Access via tar road CA-520.

title: (39706) Ontón - Unnamed road
description: Unpaved parking at the start of a coastal walk. no services, motorway not far away. to park and take a walk Excellent, I did not see any prohibitions and next to us there was a van that seemed to have spent the night here.

title: (39788) Ranero -
description: A spot for vans only in the middle of nature with a view of the surrounding mountains. Access from the Alto de la Granja, by taking the motorable road (pebbles, uphill access without problem) leading to the barn where another less pleasant fallback spot is there (lots of traffic in the evening). very beautiful sunset from the barn. We saw lots of mountain biking in the morning and gravel. Very calm night, next to the cows. No services. Place flat for 1 or 2 vans max.

title: (39788) Ranero -
description: Beautiful quiet place in the eucalyptus forest. Just a few minutes (800m) from the main road. Plenty of space for caravans.

title: (39707) Castro Urdiales - 96A Barrio Otañes
description: Several parking spaces around the church with a picnic area. Tables, bins and barbecue available next to a small river. There is a drinking fountain near the sports field below. It is quiet and very clean. Please respect nature and keep it that way. 350m back, next to the bar Teleclub on the square is a public toilet.

title: (48550) - 3D Lugar Barrio el Hoyo
description: At the side of the road very little face to the sea. A lot of pilgrims the day because it is the way to Saint Jacques. Water point to a hundred meters and in front of this fountain a path that goes down to a beautiful little cove.

title: (48550) Muskiz - 16 El Haya Auzoa
description: Gas station and clean toilets

title: (48550) Muskiz - 42 Covaron Auzoa
description: Parking Kobaron, secluded location and the access road is very bumpy but worth it, great for walking along the cliffs overlooking the area. Information area of the sea and the history of the region.

title: (48550) Muskiz - Barrio Covarón
description: Very quiet parking next to the sea and the highway. No noise, trees for shade and plenty of room for big vans and maybe AC.

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 47-55 N-634
description: Day and night parking allowed, restaurant with the best fish soup along the coast and inland.

title: (39798) Islares - 48B Lugar Barrio Islares
description: Simply a place to park and spend the night. Suitable when you have a pet since the nearby campsite does not allow our furry ones. Beach with natural pool 5 minutes on foot. No services.

name: Camping Playa Arenillas
title: (39798) Camping Playa Arenillas
description: Great campsite with very clean, modern sanitary facilities. Just a few meters to the beach. Restaurant and bar all on site.

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 82-74 N-634
description: Site on the side of the road with picnic tables surrounded by greenery to stop to rest and eat, you can hear the road.

title: (39788) Balbacienta - 18 Barrio Balbacienta
description: Water fountain

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 59 N-634
description: Nice place, overlooking the sea. Parking away from the noise of the beach but close to it. Access with a dog on the beach of the port but not on the sandy cove. Highly recommended.

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales \ Islares - 59 N-634
description:
Free parking right on the beach. Several restaurants in the immediate vicinity. Very quiet night. There are picnic benches. 2 meter restriction.
 Impressive place to spend the night quietly by the sea. Only one downside: not enough parking space. This weekend they were putting height limitation to 2.20 at the end, even so some place is left for cars.
There is a small campsite and at the entrance there is a supermarket and restaurant where you can use the toilet. The shower is the same as the beach, enough to remove the salt. The big beach at low tide is ideal for surfers and kids. And the small beach is great for looking for bugs, sneaking into the caves that discover the low tide and throw the ball to the dog. At playamar snorkeling and diving.  There is also a playground for children strategically located so that you can control them from the terrace!

title: (39788) Cantabria - 2 Barrio Rioseco
description: Outside the DIA supermarket there is a gravel parking lot, and next to it several tables for picnics, in a pleasant park. There is a fountain, although it cannot be reached by vehicle, and garbage and recycling containers. I saw no signs prohibiting overnight stays. We only stop to shop and rest for a while. Access is easy with a motorhome.

title: (39798) Islares - 61 N-634
description: At the side of the road a parking lot with a beautiful view of the beach and the sea where we stopped to eat. nice!

title: (39788) Guriezo - 6B Barrio Rioseco
description: Gravel parking lot at a church. The parking lot is higher up in the trees. It is very quiet and pleasant ç. The bells only ring every half hour :-) There are no facilities, not even a trash can. So take your waste with you and respect nature. Please keep it clean.

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 51B Barrio Oriñón
description: Parking with one-way access. Enter Orinon and follow the one-way street. For vans because limited to 2 m, large space. During the day there are cars of people going to the beach. Possibility of parking in the street along the parking lot to spend the night.

title: (39798) Oriñón - 1123 Barrio Oriñón
description: Wide and quiet place. Free less than 50m from the beach. Small shop with bakery 20m away, a few bars. No drain or water fill area. Swing and fountain nearby. ⚠️Limited 5.5T⚠️

title: (48550) Biscay - 1A Bidea Ermita
description: Public toilets and water fountain 50m away in the children's playground

title: (48550) Muskiz - 1A Bidea Ermita
description: Large parking shared with cars, close to the beach and a coastal path. Bathroom.

name: Camping Oriñón
title: (39798) Camping Oriñón
description: Camping Oriñon. Camping designed more for caravans parked all summer.

title: (39798) Oriñón - 1029 Barrio Oriñón
description: It is a phenomenal place, at the entrance it is clearly indicated that you cannot stay overnight. There are toilets and showers. It is easily accessible.

title: (48550) Muskiz - 77002 Lugar Grupo Laureta
description: Side street parking lot. Are some mobile homes

name: Bidaivan Camper Park
title: (39788) Bidaivan Camper Park
description: Totally new area with all services. 4 minutes walk from the city center. Opening hours: Monday to Sunday: 8:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. Bus from Guriezo to Castro Urdiales.

title: (39788) Rioseco - 23 Lugar Barrio Tresagua
description: Beautiful quiet spot by the river. only suitable for one van as very local area with limited space. would recommend only one night stay. drinking fountain nearby and beautiful views of river. there is also a deeper spot to swim in river if you walk downstream past next bridge and clamber down bank. friendly locals.

title: (39788) El Puente - 11 Barrio el Puente
description: Large parking lot with grass, we spent a very quiet night there, trade nearby, delicious Neno restaurant, small stream and walk nearby

title: (48508) Abanto-Zierbena - 36 La Arena Auzoa
description: There are now height restriction barriers on all the car parks. So not good for motorhome.

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 72F Barrio Sonabia
description:
Fontaine publique.
Il y a aussi des poubelles à côté.

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 92B Barrio Sonabia
description: Very restricted parking. Good to park during the day, but at night you can no longer spend the night. At the entrance of the town they have put a galibo that limits the entrance of motorhomes and campers of more than 2 metres high. ⚠️Very busy on weekends and summer months. ⚠️

title: (48550) - 35A Lugar Barrio la Playa
description: Parking spot with many spaces.  Looks good for day and night.  You have to watch out for some trees because there are low branches. we're staying here overnight.  If something goes wrong, I will post updates... The night was calm and trouble-free.  only the weather at this time of the year is gloomy ;)

title: (48508) Abanto-Zierbena - 31 La Arena Auzoa
description: Parking in the shelter. No problem for the night. The only thing people come back to dinner, start the car.

title: (39776) Liendo - N-634
description: Picnic area next to the N-634 highway towards Castro Urdiales-Santander, with 4 picnic tables. The A-8 motorway runs alongside and can generate noise at night. Flat and smooth parking space. I imagine it could be a place to sleep, we just stop to eat and rest.

title: (39798) Sonabia - 42 Lugar Barrio Sonabia
description:
Camping forbidden! 

A path that leads to the end of a rocky point overlooking a small beach on one side, the ocean as far as the eye can see on the other side. Magnificent place, popular with surfers. You can park at the bar or along the dirt road. The top. ⚠️Limited to 5.5T⚠️

title: (48550) Muskiz - 28 Fuente Vieja Hiribidea
description: Large leveled car park next to the river. There is a playground and a soccer field. Along the river there is a shady path. Supermarkets, shops, bars, restaurants at about 500-700m. Quiet at night although you can hear the Petronor refinery on the other side of the river. At about 600m there are swimming pools and wifi area

title: (48550) Muskiz - 4012 Lugar Barrio San Juan
description: Quiet and 5' walk from the town center. On weekends very well, during the week there is a school nearby and there is noise in the morning.

title: (48540) Las Cortes - A Mello Bidea
description: Rebortun recreational area, quiet place, with tables and barbecues. Different parking areas (some leveled) near the El Pobal Ironworks. The road can be difficult for large AC, narrow and with a sharp curve (the entrance has a bit of a slope)

title: (39776) Liendo - N-634
description: Picnic area near Liendo. With tables and trees. There is shade depending on the time of day and a gazebo nearby. Good place to spend the night even if it is not too flat

title: (39776) - 237 Diseminado Isequilla
description: Open space on the road, next to the path that leads to the cliff, quiet but next to the houses of the village

title: (39788) - Unnamed Road
description: Small cover over the dam rather fat ground to avoid in time of pluit. .. 4x4 access only close to a perfect wood to escape in nature

title: (48508) Zierbena - 1 Refradigas Kalea
description: Parking Port Zierbana, bins and self-cleaning toilets, playgrounds, basketball and football fields, ATM, gas station nearby, restaurants and bars. It is calm in winter and busy summer

title: (48870) - 10A Lugar Barrio Alen
description: In the middle of a beautiful 4x4 journey is entitled to calm with water point with strong pressure ... perfect for a snack break or at night !!

title: (39849) Solamaza - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place to park but only accessible with a 4x4 vehicle. We went with a big van so not only restricted to small 4x4. Nice for spending the night. Flat surface, enough for 2 or 3 vehicle maybe. Do not know if this place is allowed so at your own risk and choice.

title: (48550) Muskiz - 11 El Pobal Auzoa
description: Parking of the Pobal Ferrería Museum

title: (39849) Regada -
description: Nice place near a very quiet road, around 50 meters. There is a little hill accessible with a van and then you,are surrounded by the nature. Nice place for the night.

title: (39776) Liendo - 58C Barrio Iseca Vieja
description: Reading, 10 picnic tables to stop for lunch, sign prohibiting fire. Near a restaurant. Quiet place with shadows.

title: (39776) Liendo - 4 Diseminado Villanueva
description: Picnic area next to the Errmita de San Julián, the Camino de Santiago passes that way too, there are a few places to park and a table, a quiet place, signs forbidden to stay overnight

title: (48880) Cueto - 149D Lugar Barrio Cueto
description: Small corner of greenery to spend the night in peace

title: (48540) - Las Cortés
description: Campa with barbecues and tables

title: (39776) Villanueva -
description: Not far from a parking lot, quiet and flat place facing the sea

title: (39776) Liendo - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to San Julián beach

title: (48190) Sopuerta - 1 Santa Ana Auzoa
description: Parking in picnic area, restaurant, water fountains, next to the municipal swimming pools. You can spend the night, town of Sopuerta. Tranquility zone

title: (48500) Abanto-Zierbena - Autovía del Cantábrico
description: On a quiet highway area

title: (48500) Abanto - 13A La Magdalena Urbanizazioa
description: Hot shower !! Here is a rest area for trucks and a very modern gas station. Just ask at the gas station after the shower. There are apparently two showers. We had a full bathroom with several sinks, peephole and an extra toilet. The bathroom was clean and the shower was nice and hot! (Goods there in November)

title: (48191) Arenao, Bizkaia - 16 El Cerco Auzoa
description: Picnic area, ideal for a lunch break at the side of the road but quiet. Small stream and many tables available and barbecue areas

title: (39777) Laredo -
description: Site with very good views and level ground is located at the end of a well-groomed dirt road, it is a bit dirty but with the views it is worth it

title: (48500) Gallarta - 27 Loredo Auzoa
description: Water point and garbage cans

title: (48500) Abanto-Zierbena - Unnamed Road
description: A quiet place for the night with horses next to you.  A little to the right and you look out on the sea. At the beginning of the path is a container. There is room for 3 campers. After overnight stay take dirty wipes with you so that nature remains nature✨

title: (39777) Las Cárcobas - 9023B Diseminado Laredo
description: At the end of a small road which has become a path, at the crossroads, on the left it goes down, on the right it goes up. The square is sloping, quite a few cans of beers, but the view is magnificent over the bay of Laredo. Sunset for us all alone.

title: (48500) Abanto-Zierbena - 1H Lugar Barrio Campo Diego
description: Next to an industrial estate and the Mining Museum (recommended)

title: (48500) Picon - 2A Lugar Barrio el Cerrillo
description:
In the continuation of the other spots upstream. You will find here on the edge of the road a small clearance which can accommodate a large van or 2 H1L2 vans.
No view of the horizon but the tranquility of being alone compared to the other spot upstream and in high season...
the place is super clean and you will find several picnic tables not even 30m away. Access remains identical to the other 2, i.e. on a bitumen road but clearly not wide for a motorhome. Good night to all visitors.

title: (48980) Santurtzi - 1A Lugar Barrio Cercamar
description: Parking, unguarded, free of charge. View over harbour. About an hour by public transport to Bilbao center.

title: (48500) Picon -
description: Recreational area with a multitude of tables and barbecues

title: (48879) - 35B Lugar Barrio Tuetxe
description: Picnic area with tables and barbecues. lots of shade. A little steep

title: (48190) Carral - 7 El Carral Auzoa
description: Hermitage of San Roque. small very quiet place on the edge of a small stream ideal for cooling off and spending the night.

title: (48191) La Aceña - 38 La Aceña Auzoa
description: Swimming not allowed, big picnic and barbeque area

title: (48993) Getxo - 38 Galea Errepidea
description: Large parking lot near a fort, at the top of a cliff. View of the sea and the commercial port. Public toilets (not open at night)

title: (48530) Ortuella - 46 Catalina Gibaja Kalea
description: Washing machine: 10kg, 20kg/ dryer.

title: (48879) - 34 La Helechosa Auzoa
description: Beautiful place by a small road. Parking spot of a walk where a mining train used to go and some ruins. Very little road noise, no shade though and slightly sloping, but not much. No facilities, but a clean river to take a dip in. Very nice place for a dog walk.

title: (48530) Ortuella - 49 Mendialde Etxetaldea
description: Tables and barbecues area. Close to the town. Place to walk. You can hear the highway.

title: (39777) Laredo - 13 N-634
description: Space for 20 cars, there is usually room. Good views. Go to see it and evaluate spending the night.

title: (48191) Arenao - 1 Lugar Barrio el Solar
description: Next to the Santiago hermitage and the Loizaga terre old car museum, a beautiful car park with a fountain. Beautiful views. walking trails.

title: (48500) Ortuella - Unnamed Road
description: A small quiet corner higher than the other natural place just a little below. No direct view here, but quieter and a bit hidden. Superb point of view by going up just next to the small hillock. Room for 2 van max, also possible just on the other side on the stone path.

title: (48191) Ortuella - 9C Lugar Barrio Eskatxabel
description: This parking lot is at the entrance of several hiking routes. From 11.00 till 15.00 the museum is open with a little café where you can get coffee, a beer or some quick bites. The restaurant has a public toilet which is only open when the restaurant is open . In front of the building, up some steps, there is a watertap with drinking water. We spend a night here without any problems. In the weekend this place is very full but during the week just some hikers arrived in the morning. It is a good alternative to the other spots since it is a lot more sheltered from the wind.

title: (39820) Limpias - 55 Calle Limpias
description: Tarmac parking in Limpias, nice for a break or visit the small town. Near the A8. Small river and departure hiking trail. Tall trees make a little shade. The night does not seem forbidden ... to see ...

title: (39770) Laredo - 8 Calle Eguilior
description:
Self-service laundry from 7 a.m. to 11 p.m. 365 days a year.
2 machines 12kg
1 16kg
detergent and fabric softener included in the price
3 dryers every 10 minutes.
very clean.
the boss is very nice and speaks a little French.

title: (48993) Getxo - 34 Diliz Estrata
description: Wonderful place. Calm. Beautiful views over the cliffs and the sea. Place on either gravel or grass pavement. Water point with fresh water available. Launch site for paragliders for coastal pilots in 100 or 500m available. Bike lanes in all directions.

title: (48993) Getxo - 58 Gustavo Adolfo Becquer Kalea
description: It is the avenue through which you reach the restaurant's parking lot, if your AC is too long and does not enter the restaurant's parking lot, you can leave it along this street. We asked the police and they told us that no problem as long as we didn't take out tables or chairs and the AC didn't exceed the width of the parking lot. The street is quiet at night, a car passes from time to time. the beach 5 minutes walk.

title: (39770) Laredo - 8A Calle Marqués de Comillas
description: Secured to spend a quiet night by the beach Stay discreet Downtown very close

title: (48980) Santurce - 21 BI-3791
description: It's a nice laundromat here. Next to the laundry room on your right you have Mercadona where you can park and shop and on the left you have a cafeteria.

title: (48993) Getxo - 30 Galea Errepidea
description: Parking lot with public toilet, which fresh water. Sanitary facilities are only open until 10 p.m. Stood there for two days with no problems.

title: (48530) Ortuella - 2 Barrio la Lejana
description: Small ground parking for 5-7 motorhomes. With impressive views towards Getxo and the sea. Without any service, RESPECT THE PLACE!

title: (39770) Laredo - 12 Calle Marqués de Valdecilla
description: Parking in a street in the city center, in front of the beach, very quiet, no problem for the night.

title: (48993) Getxo - 11 Gabriel Ramos Uranga Kalea
description: Sports center surrounded by park and trees. bus to bilbao right in front.

title: (48520) Matamoros-Burzako - 1C Lugar Barrio Burzaco
description: Quiet place to spend the night. It's close to a road, little traffic at night. People come for a walk in the morning. It hit us with a bit of wind...please take the rubbish with you instead of dumping it in the buckets there as the horses will eat it!

title: (48993) Getxo - 10002 Kalea Landene
description: Car parks near the beach and skatepark with bathrooms and showers on the beach good place to spend the day

title: (39770) Laredo - 29 Avenida de Cantabria
description: Parking space along the beach at the edge of the sidewalk, no ban for the camper because no area made available by the city, however we remained discreet. Autonomy needed because only emptying possible: toilets in public. Downtown 300 m street cleaned every day. Beach beautiful damage to the buildings all around.

title: (48520) Trapagaran - 3 La Reineta Auzoa
description: The place is a viewpoint, with views from Bilbao to Muskiz, which is truly spectacular. Despite the lookout we spent a night there and had no complaints. The slope is a bit steep, but the van stopped well with the calves. It’s only worth staying at least for the sake of sight.

title: (48520) Matamoros-Burzako - 1C Lugar Barrio Burzaco
description: Good place to stop to eat or rest. It has several tables, a drinking water fountain and several bins. It also has a small park for children to play. It has easy access and a good section to park. Quiet and clean place

title: (48991) Getxo - Muelle Ereaga Kaia
description: Parking by the water with a square of grass.

title: (39770) Laredo - 2 Avenida de Cantabria
description: Street right next to the promenade to park day and night without problems.

title: (48920) Portugalete - 25 Campanzar Auzoa
description: Area with incredible views. At day it is usually full of cars, but at night very quiet area, it has no services

title: (48890) - 3 El Suceso Auzoa
description: Quiet place to sleep. A joy to wake up surrounded by fog and next to a flock of sheep. There is a recreation area next door with tables and barbecues. The fountain is in the picnic area attached to the back of the bullring, the bathrooms at the front of the bullring.

title: (48992) Getxo - 3A Marqués de Arriluce e Ibarra Kalea
title_short: (48992) Getxo - 3A Marqués de Arriluce e Ibarra Kalea
description: Parking along the harbor dike that leads to the Arriluzeko lighthouse. There is no sign of any kind regarding parking. There is some shadow. In addition to the street itself, there are parking areas like the one with the cinema at the beginning. An area very busy with pedestrians and fishermen but we found parking on a Sunday at noon when the entire area of the walk was full.

address.street: 3A Marqués de Arriluce e Ibarra Kalea

title: (39770) Laredo - 4 Calle Víctimas del Terrorismo
description: Street where to park and spend the night. Ice cream parlor next door, and churrería a few meters away. Next to the beach and the promenade

title: (39849) Ampuero - 17B Calle Doctor Antonio Ruiz Ruiz
title_short: (39849) Ampuero - 17B Calle Doctor Antonio Ruiz Ruiz
description: It is a parking lot next to the river in the village of Ampuero, near the municipal swimming pool and in a quiet area. Small vehicle only

title: (39849) Ampuero - 48 Diseminado Marron
description: Public parking next to children's area. We had to find a place to sleep and we found this one. Very quiet and seems pretty safe.

title: (48520) Trapagaran - Facundo Alonso Etxetaldea
description: Paved parking, very quiet at night, towards the city, ideal for hiking or to eat the famous beans of Bosquet

title: (48530) Ortuella -
description: The cheapest gas station on several kilometers

title: (48520) Zugaztieta -
description: In nature. Path for van or 4*4 van. Greeted by horses in the morning. Absolute calm

title: (39770) Laredo - 16F Avenida Victoria
description: Located in a dead end, parking on the right side, several motorhomes, super quiet. the beach a few steps, shower.

title: (39770) Laredo - 5A Calle García Leániz
description: Next to the promenade and the beach. Very close to the Center. There are always several motorhomes parked.

title: (48520) Bizkaia - 1J Lugar Barrio Burzaco
description: Huge free car park great views very near for Bilbao port. Country feel rural.

title: (48520) - 51C Lugar Barrio la Reineta
description: Nice place to spend the night near Bilbao. You have a view of the city and the water. Picnic bench on site. Cows and horses walk past.

title: (48920) Portugalete - 1003 Grumete Diego Kalea
description: You can park in the whole area without problem. On battery and in a row. Motorhomes of some neighbors are seen. In front of a school and a very large park. It only has a fountain and a bar that opens during the day.

title: (48510) Trapagaran - 22 Kalea Juan Sebastian Elcano
description: Parking without services next to the sports center, a market is held on Friday mornings (08:00 to 14:00 no parking); park at the bottom towards the river to hinder as little as possible and because it is more suitable. Proximity to the center of Trapagaran, shops, bread, fruit, bars... Possibility of going up to La Arboleda using the funicular and visiting the mining environment. Nearby station and being able to use the Renfe Cercanías train to visit Bilbao (20 minutes away).

title: (48520) Trapagaran - 13 La Ronda Auzoa
description: Cemetery car park, in the heights, giving a breathtaking view of Bilbao. Our old combi really gave everything to get there! Quiet, lateral green space for dogs, large and numerous places that can accommodate all types of vehicles, well motorized. Very peaceful night.

title: () Getxo - 5 Muelle Ereaga Kaia
description: Getxo sports port public services and 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. water from fountain, grassy area, the beach in front, unguarded area but the police pass every so often, information point

title: (48992) Getxo - 6 Muelle Ereaga Kaia
description: Free parking in front of the nice beach

title: (39770) Laredo - 5 Avenida Derechos Humanos
description: Street with little traffic at the end of the built-up area, next to a large and quiet park. There is usually enough space to park without problem. There is no parking ban, but it is a street, so you cannot camp. Less than 10 minutes walk from the beach and 3 minutes from some bars and restaurants. Some basic goods stores in the surroundings. 45 minutes walk from the center of Laredo, but there is a bus stop next door and a bike path on the seafront (5 min away)

name: Camping Carlos V
title: (39770) Camping Carlos V
description: Camping Carlos V

title: (48991) Guecho - Telletxe Kalea
description: Asphalt parking next to the metro station. To spend one night is fine. From Monday to Friday it is paid.

title: (48993) Getxo - 2 Ibatao Kalea
description: Parking on the street, very close to the metro to visit Bilbao. There is a park nearby. Very quiet area, there is a cafeteria 200m away where they serve spectacular tortilla pinchos.

title: (48993) Getxo - 26C Etorbidea Ormaza
description: Self-service laundry of the Ecolaundry company, access is through the entrance of the Repsol Self-service gas station from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. Last wash at 9 p.m. Open 365 days a year. ￼

title: (48991) Getxo - 22 Kasune Kalea
description: Txukun Laundry

title: (48993) Getxo - 31 Ollarretxe Kalea
description: Quiet parking without problems. There is always room.

title: (48992) Getxo - Marqués de Arriluce e Ibarra Kalea
title_short: (48992) Getxo - Marqués de Arriluce e Ibarra Kalea
description: Small free parking just before the port. A bit noisy because of the traffic but access to the metro only 500 m walk. We spent a night with 3 vans like us.

address.street: Marqués de Arriluce e Ibarra Kalea

title: (48930) Getxo - 8 Andres Larrazabal Kalea
description: Laundry located in the arenas.

title: (48890) Manzaneda de Biañez - 7 Las Torcachas Auzoa
title_short: (48890) Manzaneda de Biañez - 7 Las Torcachas Auzoa
description: Peaceful picnic area with barbecue and tables.

title: (48920) Portugalete - 35 El Progreso Etxetaldea
description: Free parking ideal for visiting the Bizkaia Bridge or Portugalete Suspension Bridge

title: (48600) Sopela - 31 Solondota Kalea
description: Parking on Sopelana beach, 5 minutes walk from the beach, big parking lot with small playground, bathrooms but now because of covid they are closed. A very closeby bar, where you can use the bathroom. There are drinking fountains and bins. The views from above are impressive. Paid parking during the day. Only for small campers. Longer than 5 meters is NOT allowed, will be turned away by the police!

title: (48920) Portugalete - 21 La Canilla Ibilbidea
description: Public baths open from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. The Portugalete tourist office is in the same building.

title: (48640) Biscay - 11002 Arebeta Bidea
description: Self-service laundry of the Ecolaundry company, within the Eroski shopping center. Open from Monday to Saturday from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (48992) Getxo - 1B Kalea Particular de Aiboa
description: Quiet street where we are parked several motorhomes. We arrived in Getxo on a Saturday morning and the port area was saturated. Taking a few turns we find this street. We made it through the night without a hitch.

title: (48920) Portugalete - 34 Calle Esteban Hernandorena Kalea
description: Parking area, in the upper part of Portugalete, there are always motorhomes from the residents of the area, a place to park and visit the suspension bridge. a 15-minute walk to the town center, a neighborhood with bars and atmosphere, next to a shopping center, slightly sloping areas and some flat plots.

title: (48640) Berango - 10A Arebeta Bidea
description: Parking without services, quiet the night we spent the night we were 9 motorhomes and vans.

title: (48640) Biscay - 20D Arebeta Bidea
description: LPG gas supply at Repsol gas station

title: (39770) Laredo - 60 Avenida de Francia
description: Drinking water fountain with a very small trickle but it allows you to fill a few liters for troubleshooting.

title: (48640) Berango - 12 Arebeta Bidea
description:
Parking in a commercial park without any type of service.
There are simply many squares, it is well leveled.
Nothing more than a place to stay with gas station, supermarket and fast food.

title: (39770) Laredo - 60 Calle Parque Público
description: Water tap in a park with palm trees. A stone's throw from the beach

title: (48930) Getxo - 21 Gobelaurre Kalea
description: Laundry

title: (48600) Sopela - 12 Goikoetxe Kalea
description: The parking lot next to the beach is only for Vans maximum 5 m. Do not pass motorhomes because they are fined. Park at this point. The beach is worth it

title: (48940) Leioa - 14 Autonomia Etorbidea
description: Parking day possible to park in camper ideal to visit getxo and the bridge of biscaye access panoramic bridge normal rate 8 euro access basket included / basket only 0.45 cts the trip

title: (39770) Laredo - 60 Calle Parque Público
description: Fairly flat gravel parking lot, very close to the beach, with a bike path on the promenade. Nearby there are bars and restaurants. On the promenade there are pay toilets. Showers at the beach access. There are always several motorhomes, although yesterday I saw that they leave a lot of unnecessary separation between them, preventing other vehicles from parking and, being such a requested place, it is poorly done. At this rate, they're going to ban it. Let's be more careful. Camping is not allowed, let's respect so that they respect us too!!!

title: (48940) Leioa - 7BIS Santa Ana Etorbidea
description: Small parking lot in front of a glass factory. Locals park here during the day and there were also a few campers. It's already in the free zone. Perfect for viewing the Biscay Bridge.

title: (39770) Laredo - 35B Avenida Enrique Mowinkel
description: near the beach.

title: (48910) Sestao - 22F Blas de Otero Kalea
description: A large parking lot, I have spent some night and very quiet, local police checkpoint very close.  There are many vans and some motorhomes;  Walking area with beautiful views, plus a laundry very close by.

title: (39750) Colindres - 45C Calle la Quinta
description: For a midday stop, but no more.

title: (39770) Laredo - 44 Avenida de la Libertad
description: On the street next to a park

title: (48940) Leioa - 12012 Autonomia Etorbidea
description: Online parking suitable for AC of any size. Perfect for visiting the Vizcaya suspension bridge, a 10-minute walk away. we were parked 3 hours, no problems. We have not spent the night, although the road next door is quite busy, at least during the day. It is a perfect place to tour the area and go somewhere else to sleep.

title: (48600) Sopela - 36b Ingestabaso Kalea
description: Online Parking. no ban. something on a slope in some section of the street. OTA is paid during the day (REGULATED PARKING)

title: (48800) Pandozales - Unnamed Road
description: La Porqueriza recreational area. Do not go up from Balmaseda!! I recommend going up from La Herbosa auzoa "road bi-630 km34.5" is a concrete track except for the last kilometer and a half which is a good gravel track. To go up from Balmaseda, the track is not very good, you have to be on an all-terrain vehicle or a van with some offroad capability. Lots of tables and barbecues. There are also litter bins and a drinking fountain. "La Herbosa crossing coordinates: 43.2267383 -3.1906060

title: (48940) Leioa - 7 Langileria Kalea
description: Parking near the suspension bridge.

title: (48940) Leioa - 84 Euzko Gudariak Etorbidea
description: Parking next to a school, for the summer it is good to spend a night, very quiet, an area without noise or lights. Next to it there is a park (the artaza park) for a walk. There is no service.

title: (48600) Sopela - 8002 Kukullu Kalea
description: Parking near one of the beaches of Sopela. Superb view of the beach and the ocean. No height restriction, but width (2.9m) and length (5m). I stayed here for one night with a California with no problem. Paid parking between 10am-8pm. Busy on weekends, also with lots of cars passing through the night. Good during the week. Beach showers nearby, as well as toilets (open between 10 a.m. and 8 p.m.). A few bars and restaurants as well.

title: (48600) Sopela - 1 Urgitxieta Kalea
description: Service area for discharge of gray and black water. The black drain is somewhat hidden, it is a sewer with a small round lid, next to the fountain. Parking meters away. No height limit. From October to May, motorhomes and vans over 5m prohibited, but you can park in the big parking next to the service area, where there's also electricity. To take water or/and connect to electricity you have to buy a token in the turist office nearby. Oficina de Turismo Sopela (next to train station Larrabasterra, 10 min walk) July August: h. 10:00-15:00 /16:00-19:00

name: Colada expres
title: (39750) Colada expres
description: Launderette, open daily from 09:00 to 22:00.

title: (48600) Sopela - 26D Gatzarriñe Kalea
description: Free parking for motorhomes of all sizes, with no height limit. Available from June to October, only. Adjoining service area. Electricity available, 3€/12 h. You can buy the token at the Turist Office, 10 min walk, see description of the nearest service area.

name: Lavandería Autoservicio Speed Queen
title: (39750) Lavandería Autoservicio Speed Queen
description: Laundry service, 2 machines of 8 kg, 2 machines of 14 kg. Pet dryers and machines too. Detergent included. Clean space. Snack vending machine. Few shops and bars nearby. Open every day from 9:30 a.m. to 9:30 p.m.

title: (39770) Laredo - 5 Avenida los Derechos Humanos
description: Just for the night, no service, quiet place. Leave clean for the future.

title: (48910) Sestao - 413 Kalea Chavarri
description: Online parking without services. source nearby. next to the pools. quiet.

title: (39770) Laredo - 75 Avenida de Francia
description: Parking in grass field

name: Camping Laredo
title: (39770) Camping Laredo
description:
Nice site and well laid out. Newly renovated showers and toilets blocks.
200m to the town and very nice promenade.
Old town nestled at the east of the promenade is well worth a visit. Narrow streets dotted with cafes and restaurants.

title: (39750) Colindres - 2B Calle Heliodoro Fernández
description: Drinking water source about 15m from the road.

title: (48600) Sopela - 4A Ingestabaso Kalea
description: On street paid parking 10.00-20.00 use the app to pay, 60 cents per hour. We also parked overnight for free, no problems, some passing traffic until midnight. Beach 5 minutes walk away. None of the “no >5m” signs seen in parking spots closer to the beach.

title: (48890) Karrantza Harana - 6F Lugar Barrio Ranero
description: Big parking at the Cuevas Pozalaguas with superb view and wonderful nature park for hiking. Very quiet during the night, some birds in the morning and eventually a Ranger showing by, that's all. The caves can be visited with a guided tour in Spanish but come with an English translation. Guide. The caves have a steady temperature of 13°C, so dress properly.

title: (39770) Laredo - 1047 Avenida Derechos Humanos
description: On the edge of the wooded park, calm and pleasant place.

name: Camping Sopelana
title: (48600) Camping Sopelana
description: Camping Sopelana. Nice location, friendly staff. Unfortunately, everything is relatively tight. The toilet has been renovated, WiFi only near the restaurant.

title: (39770) Laredo - 2 Parque Público II
description: Quiet area next to a park. Fountain in the park. Very quiet you can stay overnight without problems. We slept several motorhomes together. Beach 200 meters.

title: (39860) Rasines - 1754 Barrio Rasines
description: Large green area with picnic area. No prohibition sign. Many people the day but no one at night.

title: (48940) Leioa - 1B Kalea Gabriel Aresti
description: Parking next to the Metro. Gratuit

title: (48600) Sopelana - 31 Loroño Kalea
description: Parking at the entrance of the town. In 5 minutes you are in the center, with bakery, laundry, bars, supermarkets .... Quiet area except at the end of June that are employer holidays. There are always parked motorhomes.

title: (48940) Leioa - 33 Peruri Auzoa
description: Shopping center parking

title: (48910) Sestao - 37 Iberia Kalea
description: Parking without services a few meters from the train station to Bilbao and Santurtzi. Very close to rubbish bins and, in the nearby parking lot, towards Portugalete, there is a fountain at the foot of the road that is ideal to fill. Perfect parking to visit the surroundings, fish and watch the regattas.

title: (48600) Sopela - 2 Etxebarri Zeharbide
description: Perfect place to take a shower.

title: (39750) Colindres - 7B Calle Ría del Asón
description: The place is a street where the market is held on Fridays, therefore that day you could not park. Beautiful sunsets. You can walk or bike to Laredo or San Martín beach.

name: Camping Playa del Regatón
title: (39770) Camping Playa del Regatón
description: Super nice 100% shaded campsite on foot ria new and super equipped bathrooms, all the plots with cespep and cobbled streets supermarket and restaurant without swimming pool there is a sink in all the plots barbecues in several good places to spend several days in town 10 mins walk. Dogs accepted.

title: (48940) Leioa - 1A San Bartolome Kalea
description: Picnic area next to the Hermitage of San Bartolomé

title: (48890) Ambasaguas - 22006 Lugar Barrio Ambasaguas
description: Seven parking spaces for large motorhomes next to camping tables and a basketball court. All this in the old Dolomites factory, today a museum that can be visited where you can find out about the importance of this factory for the region.

title: (39749) Santoña - 19E Paseo Pereda
description: In winter, perfect parking for the night, but they already warned us that in summer it's crazy. Not a single car noise when we were there. Beautiful sunset and in the morning, the beginning of the routes through Mount Buciero is right next to it. We made it to the horse lighthouse (763 steps). Beautiful!

title: (39750) Colindres - 38 Avenida de Europa
description: Good place to leave the motorhome. Spacious and five minutes from downtown.

title: (39750) Colindres - 26 Calle el Monte
description: Good place to spend the night with views of the colindres marshes, very quiet, they did not bother us all night, little or no vehicle traffic. A container to deposit rubbish nearby

title: (48940) Leioa - 60 Euzko Gudariak Etorbidea
description: Parking Pinosolo, in Leioa. Quiet area, next to some swimming pools. It can be a suitable place to park and be able to get close to Bilbao.

title: (39749) Santoña - 4 Paseo Pereda
description: Parking at the end of the Promenade. There is an area reserved for the disabled and a public toilet. Quiet street at night, but busy during the day with pedestrians going for a walk and vehicles going to the building ahead. There is a restaurant nearby. Access to the route to the Caballo lighthouse is just to the right of the stairs that go up to the battery.
